declaration: theorem HTPI.fnz_even (k : ℕ) : HTPI.fnz (2 * k) = ↑k

name: HTPI.neb_step
declaration: theorem HTPI.neb_step (A : Set ℕ) (n : ℕ) (s : ℕ) : HTPI.num_elts_below A (n + 1) s ↔ n ∈ A ∧ 1 ≤ s ∧ HTPI.num_elts_below A n (s - 1) ∨ n ∉ A ∧ HTPI.num_elts_below A n s
